tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE travel_expenses (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    destination VARCHAR(255),
    travel_date DATE,
    expense_amount DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE TravelExpenses (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trip_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  total_expense DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE TravelBudget (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  year INT,
  estimated_budget DECIMAL(10, 2),
  actual_expenses DECIMAL(10, 2),
  remaining_budget DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE TravelDestinations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  destination_name VARCHAR(255),
  country VARCHAR(50),
  city VARCHAR(50),
  avg_expense_per_day DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE TravelPlans (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trip_id INT,
  destination_id INT,
  budget_status VARCHAR(20),
  plan_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE TravelHistory (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    destination VARCHAR,
    travel_date DATE,
    expenses DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE UserProfiles (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR,
    email VARCHAR,
    age INT,
    occupation VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE DestinationDetails (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    destination VARCHAR,
    country VARCHAR,
    climate VARCHAR,
    attractions VARCHAR
);
